name: deploy

# ä»£ç æäº¤åˆ°mainåˆ†æ”¯æ—¶è§¦å‘github action
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
        - name: Checkout
          uses: actions/checkout@v4
          with:
              fetch-depth: 0

        - name: Setup Hugo
          uses: peaceiris/actions-hugo@v3
          with:
              hugo-version: "latest"
              extended: true

        - name: Build Web
          run: hugo -D

        - name: Deploy Web
          uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v4
          with:
              PERSONAL_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.ä½ çš„tokenå˜é‡å }}
              EXTERNAL_REPOSITORY: ä½ çš„githubå/ä½ çš„ä»“åº“å
              PUBLISH_BRANCH: main
              PUBLISH_DIR: ./public
              commit_message: auto deploy
